data.name: Overshift
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Overshift!


In Overshift, you play as a man that was working at his office job as usual. You ended up getting lost in your work and stayed past closing. On your way out, you realize that things are not the same as they were when you first walked in this morning. You will need to solve puzzles, use critical thinking, and more all to escape this living nightmare!



Find useful tools such as a flashlight to be able to navigate through the halls with ease.



Get helpful items such as batteries to make sure that you don't run out of power for your flashlight.



Watch out for pieces of paper that could contain useful information.



How many of the following 5 points do you enjoy?

  • Short Games

  • Horror Atmosphere

  • Puzzles

  • Challenges

  • Good Graphics

If you enjoy any of those points, I think you may like Overshift!

data.short_description: Overshift is a single player horror type puzzle game where you end up working too late at your office job and leave late after everyone else has. You quickly figure out that its not going to be as easy as you thought it was to leave.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
